selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the difference between the largest and smallest bar values.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric('60 - 10') to compute the difference.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to be presented as a floating-point number with one decimal place.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use format_final(50.0) to format the answer.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_bar_values_from_chart
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the largest and smallest bar values from a bar chart image.
